name: American_girl%27s_mother
text:
American girl's mother
The American girl's mother was heard making a loud banging noise during Dale Cooper's escape from the red room. 
After vanishing from the glass box in New York City, Dale Cooper arrived at an unusual "mansion room," where an unseen presence banged on two separate doors, attempting to breach the room. When Cooper left and then returned to that room, he found the American girl sitting before the fireplace, and she implored him to exit through the nearby wall socket before her mother arrived.
